name: The Wilting Amaranth
summary: The Wilting Amaranth is a short yuri (GxG) romance visual novel based very loosely on a familiar fairy tale. It features 2 character routes, 13 endings, and 3 to 5 hours of gameplay.
info:
• 平台: pc
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2018年6月5日
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/867700/The_Wilting_Amaranth/
  • 开发: Reine Works
  • 发行: Top Hat Studios Inc
